about.introduction: NoNonsenseCooking has been built because many websites hosting recipes are overloaded with ads and useless features and have dozens of recipes per dish. How would you find the "right one"?
about.mission: We made it our mission to curate our favorite recipes to be easy to follow and without the extra fluff and then publish them here
about.cta: You want to stay up-to-date? Subscribe to our <rsslink>RSS feeds</rsslink> with your favorite reader. You like what we do? Find out how you can support our work <donatelink>here</donatelink>.

description.recipe: Cook {{name}} with a simple recipe from NoNonsenseCooking
description.main: Find simple and delicious recipes on NoNonsenseCooking

notfound.explanation: Unfortunately, we couldn't find the page you were looking for. Hopefully, the following links can help you get back on track:

notinyourlocale.explanation: Unfortunately, this recipe isn't available in {{locale}}. However, you can check it out in:
notinyourlocale.helptranslateit: In case you want to help us translating this recipe to {{locale}}, take a look at <5>GitHub</5>.
